name: CUBE INFINITY
description:
WELCOME TO LEVEL BLACK

A LEVEL WHERE COLOUR AND TIME HAVE NO MEANING

COLLECT THE DIAMONDS AND REACH THE GOAL

FOREVER

Originally, built as a proof of concept, that upon seeing the original CUBE video, I could analyze it, and create a small game based on it, it was created in the latter half of a class day.

Ever since that day, it has served as a base for the successful completion of a few assignments. One of those was the basics of Procedural Generation.

So naturally, when I became aware of this gamejam, I was prepared to take it on.

I am not involved with funnymovieinternet.
